title: Firm demand curve in PC is horizontal

content.question: If there are many firms in an industry and each firm’s product is indistinguishable from the products of all other firms, the individual firm’s demand curve will be

choices.label: upward sloping and different for each firm
downward sloping and different for each firm
downward sloping and identical for every firm
horizontal and different for each firm
horizontal and identical for every firm

content.answer: horizontal and identical for every firm
